name: Gerda Janssens
content: home page Gerda Janssens hoogleraar Declarative Languages and Artificial Intelligence Department of Computer Science Katholieke Universiteit Leuven Dept. of Computer Science Celestijnenlaan 200A B-3001 Leuven (Heverlee) Belgium 016/327634 Academic Program Director Computer Science Department of Computer Science - KU Leuven Research interests the knowledge representation language FO(.) and the IDP system integration of logic programming techniques in the knowledge representation language FO(.) program analysis and abstract interpretation performant probabilistic ILP Data Mining Systems such as ProbLog verification of functional equivalence of C programs Mede-organisator van De Vlaamse Programmeerwedstrijd 2009 Wil je meedoen aan de Vlaamseprogrammeerwedstrijd 2020?? Geef me dan een seintje!!! G0Q45  Declaratieve Talen Syllabus Informatie academiejaar 2021-2022 via Toledo H04H5  Studie van declaratieve talen Syllabus Informatie academiejaar 2021-2022 via Toledo  van het vak H0N03 Declarative Languages (het volledige uurrooster vind je ook via het vak H0N03 Declarative Languages) H0N03  Declarative Languages Syllabus Information academic year 2021-2022 available onToledo H02A3  Programming Languages and Programming Methodologies Syllabus Information academic year 2021-2022 available in Toledo. H02A8  Advanced Programming Languages for AI Syllabus Information academic year 2021-2022 available on Toledo information about the Student license for SICStus Prolog current  specifications for the ACE-ilProlog distribution I am involved in the planning and organisation of the didactical work of the department  btw .
